nodes.text: The Republic artillery cannon was a four-legged, manned artillery piece armed with one elevating turret, similar to the AV-7 Antivehicle Cannon. The cannon was manned by one elite clone trooper.

The Republic artillery cannon was part of the LEGO set number 9488 Elite Clone Trooper & Commando Droid Battle Pack. It appears in the non-canon mobile app LEGO Star Wars: Microfighters. In the 2017 reference book Ultimate LEGO Star Wars, it was mis-classified as an AV-7 Antivehicle Cannon.
